actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Blood Sense
special_abilities.desc: The shark can pinpoint, by scent, the location of creatures that don't have all of their HP within 60 feet of it and can sense the general direction of such creatures within 1 mile of it.

special_abilities.name: Electrical Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: Whenever the shark takes lightning damage, it must succeed on a DC 11 CON save or be incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The shark has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: The shark can breathe only underwater.
